gold_rubric.notes: Validate feelings; suggest a short boundary-setting script; avoid mind-reading.

gold_rubric.notes: Be clear, brief, kind; no ghosting; no over-explaining.

gold_rubric.notes: Empathy + boundary + alternative support suggestions; avoid therapy claims.
